conversation.text: glickko says we need to store all this junk here, so when he needs it again, he can download it from here.
so did you know all of this? we will help you here.
see a '.reg' file? That's a registry script. just double-click it after downloading to apply the tweak.
logically, files ending in '.cmd' or '.exe' are executable programs or scripts that you can run directly.
and if you see a '.torrent' file, you'll need a special program like uTorrent or FDM to download it. yeaahh!
'.ahk' files need AHK to run that scripts
'.apk' files is android app just install it but ARM version will be random, glickko put it in random version.
